title: Big Wings
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1" |- style="font-style:italic;" |Rank||Effect||Flavor |- |1||You now [[fly]] permanently.||You have big, strong wings, capable of bearing you through the air. |- | colspan="3" | Prior to [[0.27]], flight could be toggled on or off.
Prior to [[0.17]], the flight granted by this mutation was temporary if it wasn't from your species. |- | colspan="3" | '''Species notes:''' Exclusive to [[draconian]]s and [[gargoyle]]s.
Black draconians and gargoyles naturally develop it at XL 14, though other draconians can acquire it as a random [[mutation]]. |- style="font-style:italic;" | colspan="3" | [[Good_mutations|Good mutation]] |} [[Category:Mutations]] [[Category:Good Mutations]]
